flavor.3: It's like putting racing stripes and a giant spoiler on your hero power.
flavor.15: If she threatens to "moon" you, it's not what you think.
flavor.18: He's the reason the First Bank of Gadgetzan has steel floors.
flavor.19: Everybody wants someone to snuggle with. Even giant armored scaly draconic beasts of destruction.
flavor.23: So you say you want an evolution. Well, you know. We all want to change the board.
flavor.25: It's adorable! AND OH MY GOODNESS WHY IS IT EATING MY FACE
flavor.26: Kazakus has a squad of imps bottling Felfire round-the-clock and he *still* can't keep up with demand.
flavor.28: No Job is too big.  No fee is too big.
flavor.29: She can tell you all about the history of people not STANDING IN THE GREEN BEAM!
flavor.31: Come to beautiful Firelands! Where it's "Way nicer than the Abyssal Maw!"
flavor.33: Very dangerous when attached to a demonbomb.
flavor.42: Windfury is like Earthfury and Firefury, but more light and airy.
flavor.44: Ok, Initiate. You need to settle down and do your job. In this case, that means die so someone else can get a minor buff.
flavor.49: "Hello. Misha, Leokk and Huffer aren't here right now, but if you leave a message we'll get back to you right away." BEEP.
flavor.61: They don't make 'em like they used to! (Because of explosions, mostly.)
flavor.65: But the minion arrives covered in goo.
flavor.66: A good paladin has many tools.  Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.
flavor.68: Punching is its primary function. Also, its secondary function.
flavor.72: "Annoyinger-o-Tron" was just too unwieldy. And accurate.
flavor.74: Druids who spend too long in bear form are more susceptible to the whispers of the Old Gods.  Right now they are whispering the lyrics to "La Bamba".
flavor.76: An elegant gorilla, for a more civilized age.
flavor.80: Now that's a world champion cheesecake!
flavor.82: You'll never guess what's in that conveniently bear-sized, bear-smelling box.
flavor.97: Seeing his Jade Golem grow up into the tall, handsome 6/6 standing before him was the proudest moment of his life.
flavor.99: It starts with stealing a pen from work, and before you know it, BOOM!  Corrupted!
flavor.102: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.
flavor.104: "I don't know a lot about used GvG cards, so I'm going to have to call in an expert."
flavor.105: The stripes make it look like a candy cane, but we recommend against licking it.
flavor.109: I dub you Sir Loin of Beef!
flavor.111: Not a good basis for a system of government.
flavor.119: "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion
flavor.123: One Insane Rocketeer.   One Rocket full of Explosives.   Infinite Fun.
flavor.127: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.
flavor.134: Crescendo himself summoned this steed, riding it to victory in the Grand Tournament.  Wherever he rides, an army of riders ride behind him, supporting the legendary champion.

flavor.2776: "Naw, naw.  You're talkin' about Grime BOULEVARD.  I ain't know nuthin' 'bout that."
flavor.2777: He's not really all that crazy, he is just not as careful with explosives as he should be.
flavor.2778: "I've just sucked one year of your life away."
flavor.2780: Really, if you're a hero, this is every strike.
flavor.2781: Weblords spend all day making giant trampoline parks.
flavor.2783: Underneath all that impressive armor, he's just skin and bones.  Okay, maybe just bones.
flavor.2788: Quit playing games with his heart. And his fingers. And foot. It's rude.
flavor.2790: Lance Carrier is an obscure entry level position in orcish armies.  A mystery, since orcs don't generally use lances.
flavor.2794: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor.  This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.
flavor.2797: Is this a noun or a verb?  We will never know.
flavor.2805: There is no beast more frightening (or ridiculous) than a fully enraged chicken.
flavor.2815: The trick is not to break the lance.  Otherwise, you have "Ice Pieces."  Ice Pieces aren't as effective.
